data.name: Fantasy Grounds - AAW Map Pack Collection IV
data.detailed_description:
AAW Map Pack (Volume #4) contains 56 maps of various types and sizes.


Inside you will find:

  • - Maps of various residential buildings from rich palace to poor tent
  • - Five wild forest maps and several forest shrines
  • - Maps of different cavern lairs.
  • - Three city maps.
  • - Eight overland maps.
  • - Two maps for city encounters.
  • - Linked miniatures for all map types.

Works with all rulesets.

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
